title: Stepbrother
description: I never meant to fall for my billionaire step-brother.AllieKeeping up a perfect good-girl image is hard for Allie Hall, especially when her step-brother is the notorious Jace Harbor. With her head always buried in her books and the haunting memories of her father’s death, she wants nothing more than to end senior year on a high note, so she can get out of her shitty town.JaceSwimming in money, women, and high school football stardom, Jace Harbor can’t wait for graduation. He’s tired of the liars and cheaters and football groupies in Redwood. But when his dad sticks him with his step-sister for a week, he figures out that maybe she isn’t as bad as he thinks.How could Allie not fall to her knees for the bad boy, especially when he’s the one pushing her down onto them? Will Allie and Jace find love or is their little fling just that… a meaningless hookup to help them forget about Redwood?Stepbrother is an erotic new adult romance and the first book in the Bad Boys from Redwood Academy series of standalones.
author: Emilia  Rose
